thread.title: Who won the radio ratings battle for September 2015?
thread.title_full: Who won the radio ratings battle for September 2015? - Houston Chronicle

author: chron.com
title: Who won the radio ratings battle for September 2015?
text:
Photo: Marie D. De Jesus, Houston Chronicle Image 1 of / 23 23 Radio ratings for the month of September
A few radio stations suffered some big ratings drops in September, while others steadily pushed forward a point or two. See where your favorite frequency ranks now.

Owner:... Image 23 of 23 Who won the radio ratings battle for September 2015? 1 / 23 Back to Gallery A few stations slipped here and there to drop a few places in the latest batch of Nielsen audio ratings data for the month of September.
KTBZ-FM was one of the biggest losers, dropping to 7th place after suffering a 0.8 point loss. KKBQ-FM also took a negative hit, dropping the country station to 5th place.
Elsewhere, more than a few stations had some small successes, jumping up less than a point here and there. The elephant in the room, KODA-FM, gained half a point.
You can see how your favorite frequency faired in the gallery above.
